timeline.bodyText: This check should be left in. There have been cases were the tree equality visitor said trees were equal but the queries parsed into different strings.
timeline.author: apmoriarty

replies.bodyText: No problem, it's been added back in.
replies.author: lbschanno

timeline.message:
Fix lineage for UniqueExpressionTermsVisitor

Fix UniqueExpressionTermsVisitor to ensure that it returns a JEXL tree
with a valid lineage, and does not modify the original input tree.

Part of #880 and #968
